articles.title: 500 vaccine doses discarded at clinic due to 'human error' - Channel3000.com - WISC-TV3
articles.description: An internal investigation found the failure was an “unintended human error.”
articles.content:
MILWAUKEE (AP) Clinicians had to discard about 500 doses of the Moderna vaccine after vials were kept unrefrigerated for too long at Aurora Medical Center in Grafton.

articles.description: Los Angeles County has teamed with startup Healthvana on an app that will that will store vaccination records in Google or Apple wallets.

articles.title: ER nurse tests positive for COVID-19 eight days after receiving vaccine - ABC 10 News
articles.description: Health experts are weighing in after a local nurse tested positive for COVID-19 more than a week after receiving the Pfizer vaccine.
